description.name: mkrerc20
description.tagline: Maker erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-mkr Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Maker erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/mkr receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/mkr wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
